mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT re.report_no, re.report_title, re.report_name, re.report_date, ap.report_approver, re.report_status FROM PAS_REPORT re LEFT JOIN PAS_MEMBER mem ON re.report_id = mem.member_id LEFT JOIN PAS_APPRO ap ON re.report_no = ap.report_no WHERE re.report_id = #{ member_id }
OR ( report_status = 'DR' OR report_id = #{ member_id } )
OR ( report_status = 'CR' OR report_id = #{ member_id } )
OR ( report_status = 'BR' OR report_id = #{ member_id } )
OR ( report_status = 'AR' OR report_id = #{ member_id } )
ORDER BY report_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAS_REPORT (report_no, report_id, report_name, report_title, report_content, report_status) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(report_no),0)+1 from PAS_REPORT), #{ report_id }, #{ report_name }, #{ report_title }, #{ report_content }, #{ report_status } )
mapper.update: UPDATE PAS_REPORT SET report_title = #{ report_title }, report_content = #{ report_content }, report_status = #{ report_status } WHERE report_no = #{ report_no }
